00022 #include "dfsch/lib/cmdopts.h"
00023 #include <dfsch/util.h>
00024 #include <dfsch/conditions.h>

00026 typedef struct option_t option_t;
00027 
00028 struct option_t {
00029   option_t* next;
00030   int has_arg;
00031   char short_opt;
00032   char* long_opt;
00033   dfsch_cmdopts_callback_t callback;
00034   void* baton;
00035 };
00036 
00037 typedef struct argument_t argument_t;
00038 
00039 struct argument_t {
00040   argument_t* next;
00041   int flags;
00042   dfsch_cmdopts_callback_t callback;
00043   void* baton;  
00044 };
00045 
00046 struct dfsch_cmdopts_t {
00047   dfsch_type_t* type;
00048   option_t* options;
00049   argument_t* arguments;
00050   int flags;
00051 };
00052 
00053 dfsch_type_t dfsch_cmdopts_error_type = 
00054   DFSCH_CONDITION_TYPE_INIT(DFSCH_RUNTIME_ERROR_TYPE, "cmdopts:error");
00055 
00056 dfsch_type_t dfsch_cmdopts_parser_type = {
00057   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00058   NULL,
00059   sizeof(dfsch_cmdopts_t),
00060   "cmdopts:parser"
00061 };
00062 
00063 dfsch_cmdopts_t* dfsch_cmdopts_make_parser(int flags){
00064   dfsch_cmdopts_t* p = dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_CMDOPTS_PARSER_TYPE);
00065 
00066   p->arguments = NULL;
00067   p->options = NULL;
00068   p->flags = flags;
00069 
00070   return p;
00071 }
00072 void dfsch_cmdopts_add_option(dfsch_cmdopts_t* parser, 
00073                               int has_arg,
00074                               char short_opt,
00075                               char* long_opt,
00076                               dfsch_cmdopts_callback_t callback,
00077                               void* baton){
00078   option_t* o = GC_NEW(option_t);
00079 
00080   o->has_arg = has_arg;
00081   o->short_opt = short_opt;
00082   o->long_opt = dfsch_stracpy(long_opt);
00083   o->callback = callback;
00084   o->baton = baton;
00085   o->next = parser->options;
00086   parser->options = o;
00087 }
00088 
00089 void dfsch_cmdopts_add_argument(dfsch_cmdopts_t* parser, 
00090                                 int flags,
00091                                 dfsch_cmdopts_callback_t callback,
00092                                 void* baton){
00093   argument_t* a = GC_NEW(argument_t);
00094   argument_t* i = parser->arguments;
00095 
00096   a->flags = flags;
00097   a->callback = callback;
00098   a->baton = baton;
00099   a->next = NULL;
00100   
00101   if (!i){
00102     parser->arguments = a;
00103   } else {
00104     while (i->next){
00105       i = i->next;
00106     }
00107     i->next = a;
00108   }
00109 }
00110 
00111 static option_t* find_long_opt(dfsch_cmdopts_t* parser, char* name){
00112   size_t len = strlen(name);
00113   option_t* i = parser->options;
00114   option_t* f = NULL;
00115 
00116   while (i){
00117     if (i->long_opt && strncmp(i->long_opt, name, len) == 0){
00118       if (f){
00119         dfsch_signal_condition(DFSCH_CMDOPTS_ERROR_TYPE, 
00120                                "Ambiguous abbreviation",
00121                                "abbreviation",
00122                                dfsch_make_string_cstr(name),
00123                                NULL);
00124       }
00125       f = i;
00126     }
00127     i = i->next;
00128   }
00129 
00130   if (!f){
00131     dfsch_signal_condition(DFSCH_CMDOPTS_ERROR_TYPE, 
00132                            "Unknown option",
00133                            "option",
00134                            dfsch_make_string_cstr(name),
00135                            NULL);
00136   }
00137 
00138   return f;  
00139 }
00140 
00141 static option_t* find_short_opt(dfsch_cmdopts_t* parser, char opt){
00142   option_t* i = parser->options;
00143 
00144   while (i){
00145     if (i->short_opt == opt)
00146       return i;
00147     i = i->next;
00148   }
00149 
00150   dfsch_signal_condition(DFSCH_CMDOPTS_ERROR_TYPE, 
00151                          "Unknown option",
00152                          "option",
00153                          DFSCH_MAKE_FIXNUM(opt), // XXX
00154                          NULL);
00155 }
00156 
00157 
00158 static char* get_argument(dfsch_cmdopts_source_t source,
00159                           void* baton){
00160   char* arg = source(baton);
00161   if (!arg){
00162     dfsch_signal_condition(DFSCH_CMDOPTS_ERROR_TYPE, 
00163                            "Required argument missing",
00164                            NULL);
00165   }
00166   return arg;
00167 }
00168 
00169 
00170 
00171 static void parse_short_opts(dfsch_cmdopts_t* parser,
00172                              char* string,
00173                              dfsch_cmdopts_source_t source,
00174                              void* baton){
00175   while (*string){
00176     option_t* opt = find_short_opt(parser, *string);
00177     if (opt->has_arg){
00178       opt->callback(parser, opt->baton, get_argument(source, baton));
00179     } else {
00180       opt->callback(parser, opt->baton, NULL);
00181     }
00182     string++;
00183   }
00184 }
00185 
00186 void dfsch_cmdopts_parse(dfsch_cmdopts_t* parser,
00187                          dfsch_cmdopts_source_t source,
00188                          void* baton){
00189   char* argument;
00190   argument_t* next_arg = parser->arguments;
00191   option_t* opt;
00192 
00193   while ((argument = source(baton)) != NULL){
00194     if (argument[0] == '-'){
00195       if (argument[1] == '-'){
00196         if (argument[2] == 0){
00197           goto arg_only;
00198         }
00199 
00200         opt = find_long_opt(parser, argument + 2);
00201         if (opt->has_arg){
00202           opt->callback(parser, opt->baton, get_argument(source, baton));
00203         } else {
00204           opt->callback(parser, opt->baton, NULL);
00205         }
00206       } else {
00207         parse_short_opts(parser, argument + 1, source, baton);
00208       }
00209     } else {
00210       if (!next_arg){
00211         dfsch_signal_condition(DFSCH_CMDOPTS_ERROR_TYPE, 
00212                                "Unexpected argument",
00213                                NULL);
00214       }
00215       next_arg->callback(parser,  next_arg->baton, argument);
00216       if (!(next_arg->flags & DFSCH_CMDOPTS_ARGUMENT_MULTIPLE)){
00217         next_arg = next_arg->next;
00218       }
00219       if (parser->flags & DFSCH_CMDOPTS_STRICT_ORDER){
00220         goto arg_only;
00221       }
00222     }
00223   }
00224   return;
00225 
00226  arg_only:
00227   while ((argument = source(baton)) != NULL){
00228     if (!next_arg){
00229       dfsch_signal_condition(DFSCH_CMDOPTS_ERROR_TYPE, 
00230                              "Unexpected argument",
00231                              NULL);
00232     }
00233     next_arg->callback(parser,  next_arg->baton, argument);
00234     if (!(next_arg->flags & DFSCH_CMDOPTS_ARGUMENT_MULTIPLE)){
00235       next_arg = next_arg->next;
00236     }
00237   }
00238 
00239   if (next_arg && next_arg->flags & DFSCH_CMDOPTS_ARGUMENT_REQUIRED){
00240     dfsch_signal_condition(DFSCH_CMDOPTS_ERROR_TYPE, 
00241                            "Required argument missing",
00242                            NULL);
00243   }
00244 }
00245 
00246 typedef struct argv_source_t {
00247   char** argv;
00248   int argc;
00249 } argv_source_t;
00250 
00251 static char* argv_source(argv_source_t* s){
00252   char* res;
00253   if (s->argc == 0){
00254     return NULL;
00255   }
00256   s->argc--;
00257   res = *s->argv;
00258   s->argv++;
00259   return res;
00260 }
00261 void dfsch_cmdopts_parse_argv(dfsch_cmdopts_t* parser,
00262                               char** argv, int argc){
00263   argv_source_t as;
00264   as.argv = argv;
00265   as.argc = argc;
00266   dfsch_cmdopts_parse(parser, argv_source, &as);
00267 }
00268 static char* list_source(dfsch_object_t** i){
00269   char* res;
00270   if (!*i){
00271     return NULL;
00272   }
00273   res = dfsch_string_to_cstr(dfsch_car(*i));
00274   *i = dfsch_cdr(*i);
00275   return res;
00276 }
00277 void dfsch_cmdopts_parse_list(dfsch_cmdopts_t* parser,
00278                               dfsch_object_t* list){
00279   dfsch_object_t* i = list;
00280   dfsch_cmdopts_parse(parser, list_source, &i);  
00281 }
00282 
00283 
00284 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_cmdopts_argv_to_list(int argc, char**argv){
00285   dfsch_object_t* head;
00286   dfsch_object_t* tail;
00287   dfsch_object_t* tmp;
00288 
00289   if (argc == 0){
00290     return NULL;
00291   }
00292 
00293   head = tail = dfsch_cons(dfsch_make_string_cstr(*argv), NULL);
00294   argc--;
00295   argv++;
00296   
00297   while (argc){
00298     tmp = dfsch_cons(dfsch_make_string_cstr(*argv), NULL);
00299     DFSCH_FAST_CDR_MUT(tail) = tmp;
00300     tail = tmp;
00301     argc--;
00302     argv++;
00303   }
00304 
00305   return head;
00306 }
